item.title: 025 - On AdTech and Bad Engagement Patterns
item.description: Who would want to go through four or five clicks just to see the headline to an article they were trying to read? It’s about the principle of the thing – if you can’t read an article or browse the internet without resorting to ad blockers and hacks and different workaround, in an ever-evolving battle against invasive adtech and intrusive engagement patterns… well then, something’s broken.
